org.sd.util
Class WhirlpoolHashingFunction

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.util.Whirlpool
      org.sd.util.WhirlpoolHashingFunction
All Implemented Interfaces:
HashingFunction
public class WhirlpoolHashingFunction
extends Whirlpool
implements HashingFunction

A wrapper around the whirlpool algorithm implementing the hashing function interface.

NOTE: this implementation is NOT thread-safe. Use one instance per thread.

Author:
Spence Koehler
